name: Mochi
description: Mochi is the light-hearted meme coin on Sui that blends fun, creativity, and utility to bring communities together. Inspired by its soft, squishy namesake, Mochi spreads positivity while delivering unique features like an NFT collection with revenue share, animated short-form videos, customizable profile pictures (PFPs), and voting rights for holders. These features empower the community to shape Mochiâ€™s future while enjoying interactive experiences through a fun, engaging web app. Mochi is where laughter meets innovation in the Sui ecosystem, making crypto accessible and exciting for everyone.
